parameters.name: distributionConfigurationArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the distribution configuration that you want to retrieve.

nested_items.name: requestId
nested_items.description: The request ID that uniquely identifies this request.

nested_items.name: distributionConfiguration
nested_items.description: The distribution configuration object.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the distribution configuration.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the distribution configuration.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the distribution configuration.

nested_items.name: distributions
nested_items.description: The distribution objects that apply Region-specific settings for the deployment of the image to targeted Regions.

nested_items.name: region
nested_items.description: The target Region.

nested_items.name: amiDistributionConfiguration
nested_items.description: The specific AMI settings; for example, launch permissions or AMI tags.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the output AMI.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the AMI distribution configuration. Minimum and maximum length are in characters.

nested_items.name: targetAccountIds
nested_items.description: The ID of an account to which you want to distribute an image.
(string) ---
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The KMS key identifier used to encrypt the distributed image.

nested_items.name: launchPermission
nested_items.description: Launch permissions can be used to configure which Amazon Web Services accounts can use the AMI to launch instances.

nested_items.name: userIds
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: userGroups
nested_items.description: The name of the group.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: organizationArns
nested_items.description: The ARN for an Amazon Web Services Organization that you want to share your AMI with. For more information, see What is Organizations?.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: organizationalUnitArns
nested_items.description: The ARN for an Organizations organizational unit (OU) that you want to share your AMI with. For more information about key concepts for Organizations, see Organizations terminology and concepts.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: containerDistributionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Container distribution settings for encryption, licensing, and sharing in a specific Region.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the container distribution configuration.

nested_items.name: containerTags
nested_items.description: Tags that are attached to the container distribution configuration.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: targetRepository
nested_items.description: The destination repository for the container distribution configuration.

nested_items.name: service
nested_items.description: Specifies the service in which this image was registered.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the container repository where the output container image is stored. This name is prefixed by the repository location. For example, <repository location url>/repository_name.

nested_items.name: licenseConfigurationArns
nested_items.description: The License Manager Configuration to associate with the AMI in the specified Region.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: launchTemplateConfigurations
nested_items.description: A group of launchTemplateConfiguration settings that apply to image distribution for specified accounts.

nested_items.name: launchTemplateId
nested_items.description: Identifies the Amazon EC2 launch template to use.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The account ID that this configuration applies to.

nested_items.name: setDefaultVersion
nested_items.description: Set the specified Amazon EC2 launch template as the default launch template for the specified account.

nested_items.name: s3ExportConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configure export settings to deliver disk images created from your image build, using a file format that is compatible with your VMs in that Region.

nested_items.name: roleName
nested_items.description: The name of the role that grants VM Import/Export permission to export images to your S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: diskImageFormat
nested_items.description: Export the updated image to one of the following supported disk image formats:

nested_items.name: s3Bucket
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket in which to store the output disk images for your VM.

nested_items.name: s3Prefix
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 path for the bucket where the output disk images for your VM are stored.

nested_items.name: fastLaunchConfigurations
nested_items.description: The Windows faster-launching configurations to use for AMI distribution.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: A Boolean that represents the current state of faster launching for the Windows AMI. Set to true to start using Windows faster launching, or false to stop using it.

nested_items.name: snapshotConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration settings for managing the number of snapshots that are created from pre-provisioned instances for the Windows AMI when faster launching is enabled.

nested_items.name: targetResourceCount
nested_items.description: The number of pre-provisioned snapshots to keep on hand for a fast-launch enabled Windows AMI.

nested_items.name: maxParallelLaunches
nested_items.description: The maximum number of parallel instances that are launched for creating resources.

nested_items.name: launchTemplate
nested_items.description: The launch template that the fast-launch enabled Windows AMI uses when it launches Windows instances to create pre-provisioned snapshots.

nested_items.name: launchTemplateId
nested_items.description: The ID of the launch template to use for faster launching for a Windows AMI.

nested_items.name: launchTemplateName
nested_items.description: The name of the launch template to use for faster launching for a Windows AMI.

nested_items.name: launchTemplateVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the launch template to use for faster launching for a Windows AMI.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The owner account ID for the fast-launch enabled Windows AMI.

nested_items.name: ssmParameterConfigurations
nested_items.description: Contains settings to update Amazon Web Services Systems Manager (SSM) Parameter Store Parameters with output AMI IDs from the build by target Region.

nested_items.name: amiAccountId
nested_items.description: Specify the account that will own the Parameter in a given Region. During distribution, this account must be specified in distribution settings as a target account for the Region.

nested_items.name: parameterName
nested_items.description: This is the name of the Parameter in the target Region or account. The image distribution creates the Parameter if it doesn't already exist. Otherwise, it updates the parameter.

nested_items.name: dataType
nested_items.description: The data type specifies what type of value the Parameter contains. We recommend that you use data type aws:ec2:image.

nested_items.name: timeoutMinutes
nested_items.description: The maximum duration in minutes for this distribution configuration.

nested_items.name: dateCreated
nested_items.description: The date on which this distribution configuration was created.

nested_items.name: dateUpdated
nested_items.description: The date on which this distribution configuration was last updated.
(string) ---
(string) ---
